It is a tourist attraction due to its exceptionally beautiful surrounding locales. It was founded in 1823.Columbia-Lippincott Gazetteer, 1952 Edition, p. 1428 == References == Category:19th-century establishments in Costa Rica Category:1823 establishments in North America Category:Cities in Costa Rica
